entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 9:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
